elements.name: q1
elements.title: I am able to adapt to change.

elements.name: q2
elements.title: I have close and secure relationships.

elements.name: q3
elements.title: Sometimes fate or God can help.

elements.name: q4
elements.title: I can deal with whatever comes.

elements.name: q5
elements.title: Past success gives me confidence for new challenges.

elements.name: q6
elements.title: I try to see the humorous side of things.

elements.name: q7
elements.title: Coping with stress strengthens me.

elements.name: q8
elements.title: I tend to bounce back after illness or hardship.

elements.name: q9
elements.title: Things happen for a reason.

elements.name: q10
elements.title: I give my best effort no matter what.

elements.name: q11
elements.title: I can achieve my goals.

elements.name: q12
elements.title: When things look hopeless, I donâ€™t give up.

elements.name: q13
elements.title: I know where to turn for help.

elements.name: q14
elements.title: Under pressure, I can focus and think clearly.

elements.name: q15
elements.title: I prefer to take the lead in problem-solving.

elements.name: q16
elements.title: I am not easily discouraged by failure.

elements.name: q17
elements.title: I think of myself as a strong person.

elements.name: q18
elements.title: I can make unpopular or difficult decisions.

elements.name: q19
elements.title: I can handle unpleasant feelings.

elements.title: I have to act on a hunch sometimes.

elements.title: I have a strong sense of purpose.

elements.name: q22
elements.title: I feel in control of my life.

elements.name: q23

elements.name: q24

elements.name: q25
elements.title: I take pride in my achievements.
